long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WizApply: AI-powered Job Search, Match Scores, Resume ATS Checker, Job Application Tracker Job hunt Analytics & more!

Elevate your job search with WizApply! Our AI-powered tool analyzes your resume, matches your skills with job opportunities, tells you which jobs you are a strong candidate in and provides actionable insights to bypass ATS land interviews faster.

Join thousands of job seekers using WizApply's AI technology to improve their applications and find their perfect job match. Download now to transform your job search!

-------------------

‚ù§Ô∏è Find 5x more relevant opportunities

‚ù§Ô∏è Access through web app and Chrome extension
‚ù§Ô∏è Privacy-first approach - no data storage
‚ù§Ô∏è Powered by Latest AI: Anthropic AI Claude 3.5 and Open AI ChatGPT 4.o
‚ù§Ô∏è Affordable AI assistance without monthly subscriptions

------------------------------
‚òÖ KEY FEATURES:
------------------------------
‚òÖ Smart Job Matching: Get instant match scores and ATS optimization tips
‚òÖ Multi-Platform Search: Scans LinkedIn, ZipRecruiter, Indeed and more!
‚òÖ AI Resume Analysis: Receive personalized recommendations to bypass ATS checks
‚òÖ Skills Assessment: AI-driven evaluation of your qualifications vs. job requirements
‚òÖ Job Search Assistant: Find ideal matches across multiple job platforms
‚òÖ Quality Application Focus: Stand out with tailored improvements, not AI-generated content

-----------------------------------------
‚ú® PREMIUM FEATURES:
-----------------------------------------
- +1,000 AI Credits
- Save interesting jobs across platforms
- Track application status & organize job opportunities in one place
- Track application success rates
- Advanced CV & Cover Letter recommendations
- In-depth ATS performance insights
- Enhanced job matching algorithms

---------------------------------
üöÄ WHY WIZAPPLY?
---------------------------------
- Save 6+ hours per week in your job search
- Find 5x more matching opportunities
- Privacy-first approach - your data stays on your device
- Integrated web app & Chrome extension
- Supports major job platforms: LinkedIn, ZipRecruiter and more!

--------------------------
‚òÖ‚òÖ FAQs ‚òÖ‚òÖ
--------------------------
üßê How is WizApply different from other job trackers?
‚û°Ô∏è Unlike basic job trackers, WizApply offers AI-powered match scores, ATS optimization, and smart analytics. While competitors only track applications, our AI actually scans job portals to find jobs where you are a strong candidate and provides actionable insights to improve your resume and increase interview chances. Our platform scans multiple job boards and provides match scores without storing your data.

üßê What makes WizApply stand out from AI resume builders?
‚û°Ô∏è WizApply doesn't generate generic AI content. Instead, we analyze your existing resume to suggest targeted improvements that help bypass ATS systems. Our match scoring system helps you focus on quality applications rather than mass applying, increasing your success rate.

üßê Is WizApply free or paid?
‚û°Ô∏è Basic features like job tracking and simple match scores are free for the first 100 AI credits. Premium features include 1,000 AI credits for job search and matching, resume analysis, detailed ATS recommendations, and enhanced analytics. Users typically see 5x faster job search results with our free features alone.

üßê How does WizApply protect my data?
‚û°Ô∏è Your data stays local on your device. Unlike competitors, we don't store or sell your information. We use Anthropic AI and ChatGPT 4 for analysis only, with zero data retention.

By downloading this extension, you are agreeing to our Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy 

* WE DO NOT SELL YOUR DATA TO ANY 3RD PARTIES *

Disclaimer: [Wizapply.app](http://Wizapply.app) is an independent Chrome browser extension and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or in any way connected to LinkedIn Corporation or any other brands or sites.

Note: WizApply uses Anthropic AI (Claude 3.5) and ChatGPT 4 for analysis, with zero data retention or third-party sharing.

Visit WizApply.app for more information.
